   13: %% distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,

   15: %% See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
   16: %% limitations under the License.
   17: %%
   18: %% %CopyrightEnd%
   19: %%
   20: 
   21: %%
   22: %% Tests of traffic between seven Diameter nodes connected as follows.
   23: %%
   24: %%                                     --- SERVER1.REALM2
   25: %%                                   /
   26: %%                  ---- RELAY.REALM2 ---- SERVER2.REALM2
   27: %%                /        |
   28: %%   CLIENT.REALM1         |
   29: %%                \        |
   30: %%                  ---- RELAY.REALM3 ---- SERVER1.REALM3
   31: %%                                   \
   32: %%                                     --- SERVER2.REALM3
   33: %%
   34: 
   35: -module(diameter_relay_SUITE).
   36: 
   37: %% testcases, no common_test dependency
   38: -export([run/0]).
   39: 
   40: %% common_test wrapping
   41: -export([suite/0,
   42:          all/0,
   43:          parallel/1]).
   44: 
   45: %% diameter callbacks
   46: -export([pick_peer/4,
   47:          prepare_request/3,
   48:          prepare_retransmit/3,
   49:          handle_answer/4,
   50:          handle_request/3]).
   51: 
   52: -include_lib("diameter/include/diameter.hrl").
   53: -include_lib("diameter/include/diameter_gen_base_rfc3588.hrl").
   54: 
   55: %% ===========================================================================
   56: 
   57: -define(util, diameter_util).
   58: 
   59: -define(ADDR, {127,0,0,1}).
   60: 
   61: -define(CLIENT,  "CLIENT.REALM1").
   62: -define(RELAY1,  "RELAY.REALM2").
   63: -define(SERVER1, "SERVER1.REALM2").
   64: -define(SERVER2, "SERVER2.REALM2").
   65: -define(RELAY2,  "RELAY.REALM3").
   66: -define(SERVER3, "SERVER1.REALM3").
   67: -define(SERVER4, "SERVER2.REALM3").
   68: 
   69: -define(SERVICES, [?CLIENT,
   70:                    ?RELAY1, ?RELAY2,
   71:                    ?SERVER1, ?SERVER2, ?SERVER3, ?SERVER4]).
   72: 
   73: -define(DICT_COMMON,  ?DIAMETER_DICT_COMMON).
   74: -define(DICT_RELAY,   ?DIAMETER_DICT_RELAY).
   75: 
   76: -define(APP_ALIAS, the_app).
   77: -define(APP_ID, ?DICT_COMMON:id()).
   78: 
   79: %% Config for diameter:start_service/2.
   80: -define(SERVICE(Host, Dict),
   81:         [{'Origin-Host', Host},
   82:          {'Origin-Realm', realm(Host)},
   83:          {'Host-IP-Address', [?ADDR]},
   84:          {'Vendor-Id', 12345},
   85:          {'Product-Name', "OTP/diameter"},
   86:          {'Acct-Application-Id', [Dict:id()]},
   87:          {application, [{alias, ?APP_ALIAS},
   88:                         {dictionary, Dict},
   89:                         {module, #diameter_callback{peer_up = false,
   90:                                                     peer_down = false,
   91:                                                     handle_error = false,
   92:                                                     default = ?MODULE}},
   93:                         {answer_errors, callback}]}]).
   94: 
   95: -define(SUCCESS, 2001).
   96: -define(LOOP_DETECTED, 3005).
   97: -define(UNABLE_TO_DELIVER, 3002).
   98: 
   99: -define(LOGOUT, ?'DIAMETER_BASE_TERMINATION-CAUSE_LOGOUT').
  100: -define(AUTHORIZE_ONLY, ?'DIAMETER_BASE_RE-AUTH-REQUEST-TYPE_AUTHORIZE_ONLY').
  101: 
  102: %% ===========================================================================
  103: 
  104: suite() ->
  105:     [{timetrap, {seconds, 30}}].
  106: 
  107: all() ->
  108:     [parallel].
  109: 
  110: parallel(_Config) ->
  111:     run().
  112: 
  113: %% ===========================================================================
  114: 
  115: %% run/0
  116: 
  117: run() ->
  118:     ok = diameter:start(),
  119:     try
  120:         ?util:run([{fun traffic/0, 20000}])
  121:     after
  122:         ok = diameter:stop()
  123:     end.
  124: 
  125: %% traffic/0
  126: 
  127: traffic() ->
  128:     Servers = start_services(),
  129:     Conns = connect(Servers),
  130:     [] = send(),
  131:     [] = counters(),
  132:     [] = disconnect(Conns),
  133:     [] = stop_services().
  134: 
  135: start_services() ->
  136:     [S1,S2,S3,S4] = [server(N, ?DICT_COMMON) || N <- [?SERVER1,
  137:                                                       ?SERVER2,
  138:                                                       ?SERVER3,
  139:                                                       ?SERVER4]],
  140:     [R1,R2] = [server(N, ?DICT_RELAY) || N <- [?RELAY1, ?RELAY2]],
  141: 
  142:     ok = diameter:start_service(?CLIENT, ?SERVICE(?CLIENT, ?DICT_COMMON)),
  143: 
  144:     [{?RELAY1, [S1,S2,R2]}, {?RELAY2, [S3,S4]}, {?CLIENT, [R1,R2]}].
  145: 
  146: connect(Servers) ->
  147:     lists:flatmap(fun({CN,Ss}) -> connect(CN, Ss) end, Servers).
  148: 
  149: disconnect(Conns) ->
  150:     [{T,C} || C <- Conns,
  151:               T <- [break(C)],
  152:               T /= ok].
  153: 
  154: stop_services() ->
  155:     [{H,T} || H <- ?SERVICES,
  156:               T <- [diameter:stop_service(H)],
  157:               T /= ok].
  158: 
  159: %% Traffic cases run when services are started and connections
  160: %% established.
  161: send() ->
  162:     ?util:run([[fun traffic/1, T] || T <- [send1,
  163:                                            send2,
  164:                                            send3,
  165:                                            send4,
  166:                                            send_loop,
  167:                                            send_timeout_1,
  168:                                            send_timeout_2,
  169:                                            info]]).
  170: 
  171: %% ----------------------------------------
  172: 
  173: break({{CN,CR},{SN,SR}}) ->
  174:     try
  175:         ?util:disconnect(CN,CR,SN,SR)
  176:     after
  177:         diameter:remove_transport(SN, SR)
  178:     end.
  179: 
  180: server(Name, Dict) ->
  181:     ok = diameter:start_service(Name, ?SERVICE(Name, Dict)),
  182:     {Name, ?util:listen(Name, tcp)}.
  183: 
  184: connect(Name, Refs) ->
  185:     [{{Name, ?util:connect(Name, tcp, LRef)}, T} || {_, LRef} = T <- Refs].
  186: 
  187: %% ===========================================================================
  188: %% traffic testcases
  189: 
  190: %% Send an STR intended for a specific server and expect success.
  191: traffic(send1) ->
  192:     call(?SERVER1);
  193: traffic(send2) ->
  194:     call(?SERVER2);
  195: traffic(send3) ->
  196:     call(?SERVER3);
  197: traffic(send4) ->
  198:     call(?SERVER4);
  199: 
  200: %% Send an ASR that loops between the relays (RELAY1 -> RELAY2 ->
  201: %% RELAY1) and expect the loop to be detected.
  202: traffic(send_loop) ->
  203:     Req = ['ASR', {'Destination-Realm', realm(?SERVER1)},
  204:                   {'Destination-Host', ?SERVER1},
  205:                   {'Auth-Application-Id', ?APP_ID}],
  206:     #'diameter_base_answer-message'{'Result-Code' = ?LOOP_DETECTED}
  207:         = call(Req, [{filter, realm}]);
  208: 
  209: %% Send a RAR that is incorrectly routed and then discarded and expect
  210: %% different results depending on whether or not we or the relay
  211: %% timeout first.
  212: traffic(send_timeout_1) ->
  213:     #'diameter_base_answer-message'{'Result-Code' = ?UNABLE_TO_DELIVER}
  214:         = traffic({timeout, 7000});
  215: traffic(send_timeout_2) ->
  216:     {error, timeout} = traffic({timeout, 3000});
  217: 
  218: traffic({timeout, Tmo}) ->
  219:     Req = ['RAR', {'Destination-Realm', realm(?SERVER1)},
  220:                   {'Destination-Host', ?SERVER1},
  221:                   {'Auth-Application-Id', ?APP_ID},
  222:                   {'Re-Auth-Request-Type', ?AUTHORIZE_ONLY}],
  223:     call(Req, [{filter, realm}, {timeout, Tmo}]);
  224: 
  225: traffic(info) ->
  226:     %% Wait for RELAY1 to have answered all requests, so that the
  227:     %% suite doesn't end before all answers are sent and counted.
  228:     receive after 6000 -> ok end,
  229:     [] = ?util:info().
  230: 
  231: counters() ->
  232:     ?util:run([[fun counters/2, K, S]
  233:                || K <- [statistics, transport, connections],
  234:                   S <- ?SERVICES]).
  235: 
  236: counters(Key, Svc) ->
  237:     counters(Key, Svc, [_|_] = diameter:service_info(Svc, Key)).
  238: 
  239: counters(statistics, Svc, Stats) ->
  240:     stats(Svc, lists:foldl(fun({K,N},D) -> orddict:update_counter(K, N, D) end,
  241:                            orddict:new(),
  242:                            lists:append([L || {P,L} <- Stats, is_pid(P)])));
  243: 
  244: counters(_, _, _) ->
  245:     todo.
  246: 
  247: stats(?CLIENT, L) ->
  248:     [{{{0,257,0},recv},2},   %% CEA
  249:      {{{0,257,1},send},2},   %% CER
  250:      {{{0,258,0},recv},1},   %% RAA (send_timeout_1)
  251:      {{{0,258,1},send},2},   %% RAR (send_timeout_[12])
  252:      {{{0,274,0},recv},1},   %% ASA (send_loop)
  253:      {{{0,274,1},send},1},   %% ASR (send_loop)
  254:      {{{0,275,0},recv},4},   %% STA (send[1-4])
  255:      {{{0,275,1},send},4},   %% STR (send[1-4])
  256:      {{{unknown,0},recv,discarded},1},  %% RAR (send_timeout_2)
  257:      {{{0,257,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},2},  %% CEA
  258:      {{{0,258,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3002}},1},  %% RAA (send_timeout_1)
  259:      {{{0,274,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3005}},1},  %% ASA (send_loop)
  260:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},4}]  %% STA (send[1-4])
  261:         = L;
  262: 
  263: stats(S, L)
  264:   when S == ?SERVER1;
  265:        S == ?SERVER2;
  266:        S == ?SERVER3;
  267:        S == ?SERVER4 ->
  268:     [{{{0,257,0},send},1},   %% CEA
  269:      {{{0,257,1},recv},1},   %% CER
  270:      {{{0,275,0},send},1},   %% STA (send[1-4])
  271:      {{{0,275,1},recv},1},   %% STR (send[1-4])
  272:      {{{0,257,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},  %% CEA
  273:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},1}]  %% STA (send[1-4])
  274:         = L;
  275: 
  276: stats(?RELAY1, L) ->
  277:     [{{{relay,0},recv},3},   %% STA x 2 (send[12])
  278:                              %% ASA     (send_loop)
  279:      {{{relay,0},send},6},   %% STA x 2 (send[12])
  280:                              %% ASA x 2 (send_loop)
  281:                              %% RAA x 2 (send_timeout_[12])
  282:      {{{relay,1},recv},6},   %% STR x 2 (send[12])
  283:                              %% ASR x 2 (send_loop)
  284:                              %% RAR x 2 (send_timeout_[12])
  285:      {{{relay,1},send},5},   %% STR x 2 (send[12])
  286:                              %% ASR     (send_loop)
  287:                              %% RAR x 2 (send_timeout_[12])
  288:      {{{0,257,0},recv},3},   %% CEA
  289:      {{{0,257,0},send},1},   %%  "
  290:      {{{0,257,1},recv},1},   %% CER
  291:      {{{0,257,1},send},3},   %%  "
  292:      {{{relay,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},2},  %% STA x 2 (send[34])
  293:      {{{relay,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3005}},1},  %% ASA     (send_loop)
  294:      {{{relay,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},2},  %% STA x 2 (send[34])
  295:      {{{relay,0},send,{'Result-Code',3002}},2},  %% RAA     (send_timeout_[12])
  296:      {{{relay,0},send,{'Result-Code',3005}},2},  %% ASA     (send_loop)
  297:      {{{0,257,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},3},  %% CEA
  298:      {{{0,257,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},1}]  %%  "
  299:         = L;
  300: 
  301: stats(?RELAY2, L) ->
  302:     [{{{relay,0},recv},3},   %% STA x 2 (send[34])
  303:                              %% ASA     (send_loop)
  304:      {{{relay,0},send},3},   %% STA x 2 (send[34])
  305:                              %% ASA     (send_loop)
  306:      {{{relay,1},recv},5},   %% STR x 2 (send[34])
  307:                              %% RAR x 2 (send_timeout_[12])
  308:                              %% ASR     (send_loop)
  309:      {{{relay,1},send},3},   %% STR x 2 (send[34])
  310:                              %% ASR     (send_loop)
  311:      {{{0,257,0},recv},2},   %% CEA
  312:      {{{0,257,0},send},2},   %%  "
  313:      {{{0,257,1},recv},2},   %% CER
  314:      {{{0,257,1},send},2},   %%  "
  315:      {{{relay,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},2},  %% STA x 2 (send[34])
  316:      {{{relay,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3005}},1},  %% ASA     (send_loop)
  317:      {{{relay,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},2},  %% STA x 2 (send[34])
  318:      {{{relay,0},send,{'Result-Code',3005}},1},  %% ASA     (send_loop)
  319:      {{{0,257,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},2},  %% CEA
  320:      {{{0,257,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},2}]  %%  "
  321:         = L.
  322: 
  323: %% ===========================================================================
  324: 
  325: realm(Host) ->
  326:     tl(lists:dropwhile(fun(C) -> C /= $. end, Host)).
  327: 
  328: call(Server) ->
  329:     Realm = realm(Server),
  330:     %% Include some arbitrary AVPs to exercise encode/decode, that
  331:     %% are received back in the STA.
  332:     Avps = [#diameter_avp{code = 111,
  333:                           data = [#diameter_avp{code = 222,
  334:                                                 data = <<222:24>>},
  335:                                   #diameter_avp{code = 333,
  336:                                                 data = <<333:16>>}]},
  337:             #diameter_avp{code = 444,
  338:                           data = <<444:24>>},
  339:             #diameter_avp{code = 555,
  340:                           data = [#diameter_avp{code = 666,
  341:                                                 data = [#diameter_avp
  342:                                                         {code = 777,
  343:                                                          data = <<7>>}]},
  344:                                   #diameter_avp{code = 888,
  345:                                                 data = <<8>>},
  346:                                   #diameter_avp{code = 999,
  347:                                                 data = <<9>>}]}],
  348: 
  349:     Req = ['STR', {'Destination-Realm', Realm},
  350:                   {'Destination-Host', [Server]},
  351:                   {'Termination-Cause', ?LOGOUT},
  352:                   {'Auth-Application-Id', ?APP_ID},
  353:                   {'AVP', Avps}],
  354: 
  355:     #diameter_base_STA{'Result-Code' = ?SUCCESS,
  356:                        'Origin-Host' = Server,
  357:                        'Origin-Realm' = Realm,
  358:                        %% Unknown AVPs can't be decoded as Grouped since
  359:                        %% types aren't known.
  360:                        'AVP' = [#diameter_avp{code = 111},
  361:                                 #diameter_avp{code = 444},
  362:                                 #diameter_avp{code = 555}]}
  363:         = call(Req, [{filter, realm}]).
  364: 
  365: call(Req, Opts) ->
  366:     diameter:call(?CLIENT, ?APP_ALIAS, Req, Opts).
  367: 
  368: set([H|T], Vs) ->
  369:     [H | Vs ++ T].
  370: 
  371: %% ===========================================================================
  372: %% diameter callbacks
  373: 
  374: %% pick_peer/4
  375: 
  376: pick_peer([Peer | _], _, Svc, _State)
  377:   when Svc == ?RELAY1;
  378:        Svc == ?RELAY2;
  379:        Svc == ?CLIENT ->
  380:     {ok, Peer}.
  381: 
  382: %% prepare_request/3
  383: 
  384: prepare_request(Pkt, Svc, _Peer)
  385:   when Svc == ?RELAY1;
  386:        Svc == ?RELAY2 ->
  387:     {send, Pkt};
  388: 
  389: prepare_request(Pkt, ?CLIENT, {_Ref, Caps}) ->
  390:     {send, prepare(Pkt, Caps)}.
  391: 
  392: prepare(#diameter_packet{msg = Req}, Caps) ->
  393:     #diameter_caps{origin_host  = {OH, _},
  394:                    origin_realm = {OR, _}}
  395:         = Caps,
  396:     set(Req, [{'Session-Id', diameter:session_id(OH)},
  397:               {'Origin-Host',  OH},
  398:               {'Origin-Realm', OR}]).
  399: 
  400: %% prepare_retransmit/3
  401: 
  402: prepare_retransmit(_Pkt, false, _Peer) ->
  403:     discard.
  404: 
  405: %% handle_answer/4
  406: 
  407: %% A relay must return Pkt.
  408: handle_answer(Pkt, _Req, Svc, _Peer)
  409:   when Svc == ?RELAY1;
  410:        Svc == ?RELAY2 ->
  411:     Pkt;
  412: 
  413: handle_answer(Pkt, _Req, ?CLIENT, _Peer) ->
  414:     #diameter_packet{msg = Rec, errors = []} = Pkt,
  415:     Rec.
  416: 
  417: %% handle_request/3
  418: 
  419: handle_request(Pkt, OH, {_Ref, #diameter_caps{origin_host = {OH,_}} = Caps})
  420:   when OH /= ?CLIENT ->
  421:     request(Pkt, Caps).
  422: 
  423: %% RELAY1 answers ACR after it's timed out at the client.
  424: request(#diameter_packet{header = #diameter_header{cmd_code = 271}},
  425:         #diameter_caps{origin_host = {?RELAY1, _}}) ->
  426:     receive after 1000 -> {answer_message, 3004} end;  %% TOO_BUSY
  427: 
  428: %% RELAY1 routes any ASR or RAR to RELAY2.
  429: request(#diameter_packet{header = #diameter_header{cmd_code = C}},
  430:         #diameter_caps{origin_host = {?RELAY1, _}})
  431:   when C == 274;   %% ASR
  432:        C == 258 -> %% RAR
  433:     {relay, [{filter, {realm, realm(?RELAY2)}}]};
  434: 
  435: %% RELAY2 routes ASR back to RELAY1 to induce DIAMETER_LOOP_DETECTED.
  436: request(#diameter_packet{header = #diameter_header{cmd_code = 274}},
  437:         #diameter_caps{origin_host = {?RELAY2, _}}) ->
  438:     {relay, [{filter, {host, ?RELAY1}}]};
  439: 
  440: %% RELAY2 discards RAR to induce DIAMETER_UNABLE_TO_DELIVER.
  441: request(#diameter_packet{header = #diameter_header{cmd_code = 258}},
  442:         #diameter_caps{origin_host = {?RELAY2, _}}) ->
  443:     discard;
  444: 
  445: %% Other request to a relay: send on to one of the servers in the
  446: %% same realm.
  447: request(_Pkt, #diameter_caps{origin_host = {OH, _}})
  448:   when OH == ?RELAY1;
  449:        OH == ?RELAY2 ->
  450:     {relay, [{filter, {all, [host, realm]}}]};
  451: 
  452: %% Request received by a server: answer.
  453: request(#diameter_packet{msg = #diameter_base_STR{'Session-Id' = SId,
  454:                                                   'Origin-Host' = Host,
  455:                                                   'Origin-Realm' = Realm,
  456:                                                   'Route-Record' = Route,
  457:                                                   'AVP' = Avps}},
  458:         #diameter_caps{origin_host  = {OH, _},
  459:                        origin_realm = {OR, _}}) ->
  460: 
  461:     %% Payloads of unknown AVPs aren't decoded, so we don't know that
  462:     %% some types here are Grouped.
  463:     [#diameter_avp{code = 111, vendor_id = undefined},
  464:      #diameter_avp{code = 444, vendor_id = undefined, data = <<444:24>>},
  465:      #diameter_avp{code = 555, vendor_id = undefined}]
  466:         = Avps,
  467: 
  468:     %% The request should have the Origin-Host/Realm of the original
  469:     %% sender.
  470:     R = realm(?CLIENT),
  471:     {?CLIENT, R} = {Host, Realm},
  472:     %% A relay appends the identity of the peer that a request was
  473:     %% received from to the Route-Record avp.
  474:     [?CLIENT] = Route,
  475:     {reply, #diameter_base_STA{'Result-Code' = ?SUCCESS,
  476:                                'Session-Id' = SId,
  477:                                'Origin-Host' = OH,
  478:                                'Origin-Realm' = OR,
  479:                                'AVP' = Avps}}.
